title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia          Photo Gallery Victory Photo Gallery...contains selected photos from Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial, including scenic views of the memorial, an inside look at special events, and images from our historic archive.         Panorama from Memorial Observation Deck High Quality 1024x768 (1.6MB)  Medium Quality 800x600 (0.6MB) Low Quality 640x480 (0.2MB) The observation deck gallery captures the panoramic view of western Lake Erie that one would see from atop the memorial column. From this height of 352 feet Middle Bass Island, North Bass Island, Johnson's Island, Kelley's Island, Pelee Island in Canada, and the Ohio mainland of Catawba Point and Marblehead Peninsula are visible. On a clear day it is possible to see as far as Detroit, Toledo and Cleveland.           South Bass Island Map  South Bass Island Map... A map of the roads and parks on South Bass Island, home of Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial.         Illustrated Film The Naval War of 1812 Illustrated... To commemorate the Bicentennial of the war, the American Society of Marine Artists has released a seven-part video, featuring the finest collection of art created over the last two hundred years to illustrate this vital era.  The film is offered free to the public as an educational and entertainment documentary.
